quote.quotepara: On Tue, 21 Jun 2011, Mirko Maier wrote:
i have a patch window with a (big) image, using günther geigers "image"

external (win xp), and with some data structures. using the "clear" message for the window a couple of times and then reloading the image (between 10 and 25 times of clearing and reloading), it doesn't load anymore. does anyone know a solution?
However, for big images, there's a great speedup that is supposed to be available in next release. (currently only available through SVN)

body.para: when I try to see the help for #see I get:
swScaler: Exactly one scaler algorithm must be chosen pd_gui: pd process exited Segmentation fault
pd 0.42.5-extended GridFlow 9.13, Copyright (c) 2001-2010 Mathieu Bouchard GridFlow was compiled on Dec 18 2010, 18:00:44 GF: setting stack size to -1 GridFlow: using MMX optimisations Ubuntu 10.10
